DIA_Riki_Hello_StopLookingAtMyFutureWife: What about you? You look a little pale.
There was one in particular... caught my eye. See that blonde?
The face...to be replaced, but the rest I wouldn't mind!
Stop staring at that girl like she's a piece of meat.
I'll stare at whomever I want, however I want, and it's none of your business, you little prick!
DIA_Riki_Hello_AlbynIsMyFriend_15_01: Did you see those chains outside?
DIA_Riki_Hello_AlbynIsMyFriend_03_02: They've been there... for ten years. It's not hard to miss them.
DIA_Riki_Hello_AlbynIsMyFriend_15_03: I can make you get to them.
DIA_Riki_Hello_AlbynIsMyFriend_03_04: And how... would you do that?
DIA_Riki_Hello_AlbynIsMyFriend_15_05: As a matter of fact I'm a friend of the Elder. All I have to do is say the word, and you're in them for a nice couple of days.
DIA_Riki_Hello_AlbynIsMyFriend_03_08: Okay, well...if you put it that way... I don't want to get in... trouble.
DIA_Riki_Hello_AlbynIsMyFriend_03_09: You can even take that...girl if you care about her so much!
DIA_Riki_Hello_AlbynIsMyFriend_03_10: Now, leave me alone with my bottle maiden.
DIA_Riki_Hello_AlbynIsMyFriend_03_11: They've been there for ten years. They're not hard to miss.
DIA_Riki_Hello_AlbynIsMyFriend_03_12: And how would you do that?
DIA_Riki_Hello_AlbynIsMyFriend_03_13: Someone like you is fraternizing with Albyn! Hahahaha!
DIA_Riki_Hello_AlbynIsMyFriend_03_14: Don't make me laugh, you little shit. Try harder next time.
DIA_Riki_Hello_YouWantSomeTrouble_15_01: Leave the lady alone, unless you want to get in trouble with the guards.
DIA_Riki_Hello_YouWantSomeTrouble_03_02: Where do you see a... guard?
DIA_Riki_Hello_YouWantSomeTrouble_03_04: Ha, good luck with that! I drank a whole bottle of booze with Harry yesterday.
DIA_Riki_Hello_YouWantSomeTrouble_03_05: I'm no in danger from the sentries.
DIA_Riki_Hello_IWillFightWithYou_15_01: If you don't stop, you'll have to deal with me.
DIA_Riki_Hello_IWillFightWithYou_03_02: And what can you do to me?!
DIA_Riki_Hello_WantToDrink_15_01: Why don't you have a drink with me?
DIA_Riki_Hello_WantToDrink_03_02: Hehe... As the townspeople say, good booze is your enemy, so punch it in the face!
DIA_Riki_Hello_YouOffer_03_02: The rule is simple, the stronger, the better. Leave the choice to me.
DIA_Riki_Hello_YouOffer_03_03: Give me the strongest liquor here, on the young man's dime.
DIA_Riki_Hello_YouOffer_03_05: By the way, I haven't seen you here before.
DIA_Riki_Hello_Wine_03_02: Wine?! Who are you, a woman?
DIA_Riki_Hello_Wine_03_03: We will not drink that kind of filth at my table!
DIA_Riki_Hello_Wine_03_04: Give me the booze, on this young man's expense.
DIA_Riki_Hello_Beer_03_02: Beer's always good, but you can tell right away who is the amateur here.
DIA_Riki_Hello_Beer_03_03: Give me two pints of beer here, on this young man's expense.
DIA_Riki_Hello_ImNotFromThere_15_01: You didn't see, because I'm not from here.
DIA_Riki_Hello_ImNotFromThere_03_02: So you're the new guy, snooping around and looking everywhere?
DIA_Riki_Hello_ImNotFromThere_15_03: You meant to say, one of the new ones.
DIA_Riki_Hello_ImNotFromThere_03_04: I would have forgotten that a whole bunch came along with you.
DIA_Riki_Hello_ImNotFromThere_03_06: To those who will protect us from your bunch!
DIA_Riki_Hello_ImNotFromThere_15_07: You are not very hospitable here, are you?
DIA_Riki_Hello_ImNotFromThere_03_08: Why should we show hospitality when everyone is taking our jobs!
DIA_Riki_Hello_ImNotFromThere_03_09: First the townspeople buy our land, and when we somehow manage to drive them out of it, a horde of newcomers appears!
DIA_Riki_Hello_ImNotFromThere_03_10: On the other hand, there is a lot to look at, hehe...
DIA_Riki_Hello_FromTown_03_02: As a rule, I don't like townspeople, but of the two evils, I dislike the bums much more.
DIA_Riki_RikiWonFight_03_01: As I've said before, I'll stare at who I want and how I want!
DIA_Riki_RikiLostFight_15_02: You had enough? Will you leave the lady alone?
DIA_Riki_RikiLostFight_03_03: Yeah...I've had enough! I didn't do a damn thing to her!
DIA_Riki_RikiLostFight_03_04: They won't even let you look at them anymore...you bums...
DIA_Riki_Q207_Antonio_Description: Do you know where I can find Antonio?
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_03_02: Me? I'm sitting down. Why? An honest citizen has no right to rest a moment?
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Porter_03_02: Antonio? Well, there's a lot of them coming through here lately. Their wagons are so loaded that sometimes they lose something, so I take it for myself.
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Porter_15_03: I'm talking about a particular Antonio. That's his nickname.
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Porter_03_05: I recall, but... shit I got such a headache, I can't concentrate.
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Porter_03_06: Bring me something to cheer me up and maybe I'll remember.
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Porter_03_07: Wait, wait, wait... it's you! I remember that limey face of yours almost as well as last night's booze!
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Porter_03_08: First you punch me in the face, and now you come here and bother me?!
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Porter_15_09: Let's face it, you deserved it for upsetting that girl.
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Porter_03_10: You won't hear anything from me! Piss off!
DIA_Riki_Q207_Owner_15_01: Does the owner of this vineyard know you're here?
DIA_Riki_Q207_Owner_03_02: Rita? Well, she knows. She told me to keep an eye on the road to make sure no beasts of the field came across it.
DIA_Riki_Q207_Owner_03_04: She even gave me two bottles of wine as an incentive, but...
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Want_03_02: Rita's wine reeks of vinegar, but it's a first-rate mouth twister.
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Want_03_03: Get another bottle for old Rik and we'll talk.
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Water_15_01: I'll get you something, but to sober you up.
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Water_03_02: Come on, I've never been drunk in my life, man!
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Water_15_03: Why don't we do a little test then?
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Water_15_04: Tell me, how many fingers do you see?
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Water_03_05: Fingers? I see a whole damn fist.
DIA_Riki_Q207_Farm_Water_03_06: Okay, um... I think I actually overdid with the wine.
DIA_Riki_Q207_OfferDrink_Antonio_15_01: Will you tell me what do you know about this Antonio?
DIA_Riki_Q207_OfferDrink_Antonio_03_02: What's there to say? He was here, and then he disappeared.
DIA_Riki_Q207_OfferDrink_Antonio_03_03: I saw him in the village a few days ago. He used to go there every week, but as time went by he came more and more drunk and lethargic, until finally I stopped seeing him at all.
DIA_Riki_Q207_OfferDrink_Antonio_03_04: The world changes, companions leave, and the booze runs out. That's the way things are.
DIA_Riki_Q207_OfferDrink_Sober_Here_15_0: Have you seen him anywhere around here?
DIA_Riki_Q207_OfferDrink_Sober_Here_03_0: No, but if my memory serves me right, he used to come to the village with friend of his, Nayla. As far as I know, he worked with her on that vineyard.
DIA_Riki_Q207_OfferDrink_Wine_15_01: Here, I brought you some wine.
DIA_Riki_Q207_OfferDrink_Sober_15_01: Here, you will feel much better after this.
DIA_Riki_Q207_OfferDrink_Sober_03_02: No, it's not the same as a bottle of grog though.
DIA_Riki_Q207_OfferDrink_Sober_15_03: Look at it this way. This will help you get back to tasting your favorite beverages faster.
DIA_Riki_Hello_StopLookingAtMyFutureWife: Have you seen those chains outside? I'll make you get into them.
You want to get in trouble with militia?
Stop it or you'll have to deal with me.
